attributes.action: tell the tax payers why MPs expenses are not authorised and audited
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In every organisation I know of, expenses have to be authorised by a senior member of staff before payment is made.  At the year end auditors audit the accounts.  Have MPs not had to have them authorised, if so, why, if they have been, what has gone wrong.  Also, expenses above a certain level are taxable.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
